Annex I of Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2022/1288 with regard to disclosure rules on sustainable investments
(“Violations of UN Global Compact principles and Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) Guidelines
for Multinational Enterprises”); and benchmark administrators to disclose ESG factors subject to Regulation (EU)
